trinkets.name: Silver Brooch

trinkets.description: Brilliant cut emerald mounted for display.

trinkets.description: Winds up and plays a soft lullaby.

trinkets.description: A well-crafted case; the map is long gone.

trinkets.description: A glyph-etched disc of deep green jade.

trinkets.name: Traveler’s Charm
trinkets.description: A simple charm said to ward off bad luck.

trinkets.description: A folding fan with a pastoral scene.

trinkets.name: Engraved Locket
trinkets.description: A hinged pendant with space for a tiny portrait.

trinkets.name: Collector’s Stamp Sheet
trinkets.description: Mint condition; niche but valuable.

trinkets.name: Crystal Paperweight
trinkets.description: Heavy globe that refracts light nicely.

trinkets.name: Ornate Candleholder
trinkets.description: Polished brass, slightly tarnished with age.

trinkets.name: Miniature Ship in Bottle
trinkets.description: Fine rigging painstakingly assembled inside glass.

trinkets.name: Lapis Lazuli Bead
trinkets.description: A deep blue polished bead for necklaces.

trinkets.description: Looks sharp but meant only for letters.

trinkets.description: Empty, but very collectible.

trinkets.description: A sea treasure mounted on a small stand.

trinkets.name: Ceremonial Mask (Replica)
trinkets.description: Decorative reproduction meant for walls.

trinkets.name: Clockwork Beetle
trinkets.description: Whirs to life when wound; surprisingly charming.

trinkets.description: A folio of preserved blooms from many regions.

trinkets.name: Gnomish Kaleidoscope
trinkets.description: Shifting patterns delight children and adults alike.
